To avoid temporal autocorrelation of local extinction, we only used data of 2 sampling years representing the year of presence or absence of the species in the grid in our modeling analysis ( Fig. 4). The sampling year of absence was 1 y after the last observation, while the sampling year of presence was the year 50 y before the sampling year of absence. The anthropogenic and climatic variables of the sampling year of presence or absence were the average values of human population density and the standardized temperature variable of last 50 y of the sampling years ( Fig. 4).
